pages.privacy-policy: SunrisePlains Privacy Policy - Safeguarding Your Personal Information SunrisePlains HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Privacy Policy At SunrisePlains Hotel, we are dedicated to safeguarding the privacy and personal information of our guests and website visitors. This Privacy Policy explains the types of personal data we collect, how we use and protect it, and the choices available to you regarding your information. Information We Collect We collect various types of personal information when you interact with us. This includes: Personal Details: Such as your name, email address, phone number, and home address when you make a reservation or register on our website. Payment Information: Including credit card details and billing information necessary for processing payments. Preferences: Information about your preferences and interests, which helps us personalize your experience. Technical Data: Such as IP addresses, browser type, operating system, and browsing behavior collected through cookies and similar technologies. How We Use Your Information We use your personal information for various purposes, including: Processing Reservations: To confirm and manage your bookings and provide the services you have requested. Customer Support: To respond to your inquiries, resolve issues, and improve our customer service. Personalization: To tailor our services and offers to your preferences and enhance your experience at our hotel. Marketing Communications: With your consent, we may send you promotional offers, newsletters, and updates about our services. Improving Services: To analyze usage patterns and enhance our website, products, and services. Sharing of Information We may share your personal information with third parties under the following circumstances: Service Providers: Trusted partners who assist us with payment processing, marketing, IT support, and other essential functions. Business Partners: Companies we collaborate with for joint promotions or services. Legal Requirements: When required by law, regulation, or legal process, or to protect the rights, property, or safety of our guests, employees, or others. Data Security We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. These measures include encryption, firewalls, secure servers, and regular security audits. Your Choices You have the following rights regarding your personal information: Access and Correction: You can request access to your personal information and correct any inaccuracies. Deletion: You can request the deletion of your personal data, subject to certain legal obligations. Opt-Out: You can opt out of receiving marketing communications by following the unsubscribe instructions included in our emails or by contacting us directly. Policy Updates We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We encourage you to review this policy regularly to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at: SunrisePlains Hotel Email: sunriseplains@gmail.com Phone: +91-257-365-5896 Address: B K Boman Behram Marg, Apollo Bandar, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India The SunrisePlains website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
